sub_title: Data Analyst, Data Science, Business Intelligence, Market Research, UX Research
summary:
As a business professional seeking growth through continuous learning opportunities, I obtained my Masters' Degree in Economics & Business, specializing in Behavioral Economics. My interest in this field stemmed from my work experiences which exposed me to various types of customers, clients, and other stakeholders, as well as the increasingly crucial role that data plays in business. I find analyzing data to derive insights beneficial for strategic decision-making to be interesting, challenging, and fulfilling.

Throughout my work experiences, I have a demonstrated history of working in B2B services, food & beverages and non-profit sectors across three countries. My career journey has brought me to my current track of market research, marketing, and data analysis, where my experiences include research within the manufacturing, trading, oil & gas, services, and development sectors.

awards.title: Young and Smart Entrepreneurs Program
awards.description:
The Universitas Indonesia Young and Smart Entrepreneurs Program is conducted by UI with the aim of supporting budding entrepreneurs to execute their business ideas through knowledge and financial support.

- One of top business ideas chosen to receive funding from the university program
- Executed business idea selling bitter ballen pastry snack

awards.title: International Award of Excellence: Judges' Choice Award (Ritsumeikan International Essay Contest)
awards.description:
The Ritsumeikan international essay contest is held annually as a platform for the youth who will carry the coming generation to express their thoughts and questions to the world. Every year the contest attracts essays from high schools within Asia, Africa, Europe and North America.

- Wrote essay regarding the theme “Globalization: A Borderless Economy” as international participant

projects.title: Central Eastern Europe Leadership Development Seminar
projects.description:
Role in Project: Facilitator & Content Creator

CEELDS is a regional conference held on an annual basis for AIESEC members globally, with a focus on members of AIESEC in Central and Eastern Europe. Delegates of CEELDS 2015 reached a total sum of approximately 200 people. The aim of the conference is to facilitate dialogue and collaboration within the region in order to increase the relevance of AIESEC's projects in Europe, the quality of people sent on exchange programs, as well as increase overall performance of AIESEC in Europe.

contributors.headline: Data Analyst, Data Science, Business Intelligence, Market Research, UX Research

projects.title: Caprisun - Overseas Business Project
projects.description:
Role in Project: Assistant to Project Manager

The Caprisun Project is a business cooperation project between PT Tiga Pilar Sejahtera Food Tbk with Caprisun AG in Germany, where TPS Food has acquired the license to produce and distribute Caprisun ready to drink beverage in Indonesia.

contributors.headline: Data Analyst, Data Science, Business Intelligence, Market Research, UX Research

profile_positions.description:
- Put together BI tool & dashboard with export-import transaction data in relevant markets for the commercial team
- Identified new business opportunities within the European food, pharma, & cosmetics sector by analyzing relevant trends/technologies and conducting competitors’ analysis
- Identified prospective companies, conducted inside sales, and generated new leads in Europe & other areas to support the commercial team
profile_positions.title: Market Research Analyst

profile_positions.description:
BOI Research is an experienced market research agency first established in the Netherlands and now based in Indonesia, specialized in supporting market researchers and market research companies alike. BOI has a boutique market research approach, focusing on finding the right research tools to gain insights for clients.

Achievements:

- Executed the first “gender equality in the workplace based on the Women’s Empowerment Principles” in Indonesia study as project manager
- Constructed high-quality research reports, data analysis, as well as survey & discussion content for clients from over 10 sectors
- Monitored respondent recruitment, controlled quality of fieldwork results, & conducted/supervised execution of fieldwork

PT Tiga Pilar Sejahtera food is an Indonesian fast moving consumer goods company within the food and beverage sector, specializing in the production and distribution of ready to eat and ready to drink products as well as pre-cooked and ready to cook food products.
